author: cbs8
title: SayHueque.com Launches New Iguazu Falls Tours
text:
Say Hueque - Argentina Journeys
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina , Oct. 15, A world heritage site and one of the new 7 Wonders of Nature, Iguazu Falls is one of the most breathtaking sights to behold. With over 250 waterfalls surrounded by the tropical jungle of Argentina and Brazil , one can't get much closer to nature in all her glory. SayHueque.com realized the appeal and has launched a series of new Iguazu Falls Tours.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277252
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277253
One of the most popular destinations in South America , travelers will marvel as colorful parrots fly overhead and chatter away in the nearby trees of this jungle oasis. Tour the Argentine side of Iguazu Falls and you will get up close and you can actually feel the refreshing mist off of the towering 80 meter Garganta del Diablo waterfall. In contrast, the Brazilian side of Iguazu is perfect to appreciate the panoramic vistas and sweeping landscapes!
New Iguazu Falls Tours:
BUENOS AIRES & IGUAZU FALLS – 6 DAYS
Enjoy the perfect combination of South American culture, tango and jungles on this 6 day tour of Argentina . Discover sophisticated Buenos Aires' eclectic neighborhoods before touring Iguazu Falls National Park. Shared by Argentina and Brazil , this UNESCO World Heritage site is a "must-see" during your stay in Argentina .
Learn more about this Iguazu Falls Tour here: http://www.sayhueque.com/buenos-aires-iguazu-falls-6-days/
IGUAZU FALLS – POWER OF NATURE
Visit the Iguazu Falls in a different way. Accompanied by a naturalist guide and staying in a jungle lodge this tour will give you the chance to experience the waterfalls focusing in the natural environment.
Learn more about this Iguazu Falls Tour here: http://www.sayhueque.com/iguazu-falls-power-of-nature/
IGUAZU FALLS – SELF GUIDED TOUR
Iguazu Falls Argentine and Brazilian sides at your own pace- explore the Parks on your own, with all the information that you need to make this a memorable visit. Have your own personal and unique experience in one of the Natural Wonders of the world.
Learn more about this Iguazu Falls Tour here: http://www.sayhueque.com/iguazu-falls-self-guided/
About Say Hueque
Say Hueque – Tours in Argentina and Chile is a travel company based in Buenos Aires, Argentina . Established in 1999, we specialize in providing customized tours to independent travelers throughout Argentina and Chile´s national parks and cities. Popular destinations and experiences include Buenos Aires , Iguazu Falls, Perito Moreno Glacier, hiking in Patagonia, wine tasting in Mendoza, horseback riding at traditional estancias, glacier cruises and much more. Learn more about our new Iguazu Falls Tours at: http://www.sayhueque.com
Contact:

303-898-3376
